line.text: To order the agent to change its rules of engagement.

: the agent is free to open fire to any enemi unit, depending on its mission. This rule doesn't mean that the agent automatically open fire when an enemy is in range. This should happen only through the mission the agent is performing (attack or recce in force for instance).
: the agent can only fire back to units that have previously open fire on it.
r: the agent never open fire, even if it is attacked.
